title: Executive Order 6105-Authorizing the Appointment of Miss Jessie B. Saunders
content: Miss Jessie B. Saunders may be appointed to an appropriate position in the Bureau of the Budget without regard to the civil-service rules.
This order is recommended by the Director of the Bureau of the Budget.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6105-Authorizing the Appointment of Miss Jessie B. Saunders Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361935
